redirects.comments:
There's a web comic strip called xkcd.  The content is usually scientific/mathematic/computer stuff.  Sometimes it's a real heads scratcher as to what the author is trying to convey  (some jokes DO need to be explained).   

Well, there's a separate website specifically for explaining xkcd.   It's URL format is exactly like that of the original, with a simple text replacement

The website is here: https://xkcd.com
